bibl.title: Making the Private Public: A Delivery of Palestinian Oil in Third / Ninth-Century Egypt.
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, ninth century. - 1. Introduction: Egypt as centre of the world. - 2. Order for delivery of Palestinian oil. - 3. A transregional trade network. - 4. A system of care and dependency. - 5. Legalising private transactions. - 6. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Petra M. Sijpesteijn, Making the Private Public: A Delivery of Palestinian Oil in Third / Ninth-Century Egypt.

Provenance unknown, ninth century. - 1. Introduction: Egypt as centre of the world. - 2. Order for delivery of Palestinian oil. - 3. A transregional trade network. - 4. A system of care and dependency. - 5. Legalising private transactions. - 6. Conclusion.
